title: Latest updates: Water supply problems in Derbyshire - BBC News
summary: water chlorine problem hits thousands of homes in derbyshire .
residents in several areas told not to use water .
severn trent says problem will not be resolved before 12:00 on saturday .

documents.title: our live coverage across the day
text: that 's the end of our live coverage of the water problems affecting parts of derbyshire .
keep listening to bbc radio derby and watch east midlands today at 22:30 for the latest .

BBC Local Live

documents.title: no water until at least 12:00 on saturday
text: here 's the full statement from severn trent water on its announcement that normal service should be resumed at some point after midday tomorrow .
the firm 's spokesman would not be drawn on exactly how long it would be before water in affected postcodes would be safe to use .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

documents.title: severn trent : end in sight for chlorine problem
text: jonathan smith , from severn trent water , has just told us the company expects to have the system flushed by midday tomorrow .
he said : `` we 'll then get supply through and we 'd hope that , subject to testing , we can look at returning everything to normal as soon as possible . ''
he also said it was now safe for customers in affected postcodes to flush their toilets .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

text: the newly-published list of individual postcodes affected by the chlorine issue is very useful as it significantly reduces the number of potential homes affected .
for example , there are only two de15 postcodes where residents are being told not to use water .
not such good news if you live in de11 or de73 though - dozens of postcodes are listed .
author: Gavin Bevis
BBC Local Live

text: severn trent water has yet to give any indication on when its chlorine problems might be resolved .
a spokesman for the firm said it would not be taking any chances with its customers ' health .

documents.title: south staffs water customers not affected
text: here 's an important piece of information from south staffs water

the firm says : `` if you have received a message regarding high levels of chlorine in the water supply in postcode areas de11 , de15 , de65 , de73 and you are a south staffs water customer , your water supply is not affected by this issue and is safe to use . ''

text: a spokesman for severn trent water says the firm has been in touch with its most vulnerable customers to see what their needs are
it is also making bottled water available to customers at sainsbury 's in swadlincote .

documents.title: five areas affected by water problems
text: the latest information on the severn trent water chlorine problem is that customers in five postcode areas are affected .
the firm 's website lists them as de11 , de15 , de65 , de73 and le65 and everyone living there should not use their water supply .
the company 's stressed that residents should n't drink water , flush the toilet or have baths and should n't use it in food preparation .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: water warning residents head to the shops
text: perhaps inevitably , we 're hearing reports of increased sales of bottled water in areas affected by this afternoon 's chlorine issue in parts of derbyshire and leicestershire .

BBC Local Live

documents.title: name mystery over missing woman
text: an appeal by derbyshire police over a woman whose been missing for a month has been shared hundreds of times online .
anne collinson , 62 , from repton , travelled to darwin in australia before taking a flight to adelaide from alice springs .
the force 's appeal for information has been shared more than 1,800 times on facebook .
derbyshire police said officers in australia have spoken to a lady who gave her name as anne robinson on the number the force holds for miss collinson .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: water supply problems : your comments
text: there 's been more reaction on our facebook page after severn trent warned customers in south derbyshire not to use their water .
i mentioned earlier that rachel hambridge posted that she was left with a red brick stain on her bath that needed bleach to clear it here 's her photograph of how it looked .

documents.title: thomasina bennett : care home manager gives evidence
text: a senior care home manager has told a court that they could not foresee the accident that resulted in an elderly resident being found dead under a wardrobe that fell on top of her .
derby crown court heard that there were no industry-wide regulations for fastening furniture to walls or for checking the personal activity monitors .
the care home partnership which owns the home at milford denies two health and safety at work charges , following the death of 80-year-old thomasina bennett .
the trial continues .
author: Mike O'Sullivan
Reporter, East Midlands Today

documents.title: derby to welcome new shoe shop
text: a new dr marten 's store is to open in derby next month creating new jobs .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: water company website crashes
text: severn trent water 's website has crashed because of demand for information about the water ban in south-east derbyshire .
the firm has changed the areas affected to de11 , de65 and de73 - covering 3,555 properties .
it says the chlorine problem is at castle donington reservoir , where a monitoring systems alarm went off to alert staff .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police hunt pair after car smash spree
text: police have released video footage of two men they want to speak to after several cars had their windows smashed in mackworth .
the vandalism spree happened in the early hours of tuesday 26 january .

documents.title: 'red brick stain ' left on bath
text: if you 'll pardon the pun , reaction has been pouring in on the bbc radio derby facebook page following severn trent water 's decision to urge its customers in south-east derbyshire and north-west leicestershire not to use their water .
rachel hambridge posted : `` when i emptied my bath i was left with like a red brick stain that was difficult to remove , had to use bleach . ''
lindsay hammond asked : `` what happens if you have had a drink of water or had water out of the tap today ?
bit worried now . ''
and billy , an entrepreneur , says : `` selling showers for £ 25 per 30 mins .
de15 area . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: water 'flushed through system ' before ban gets lifted
text: severn trent water says it 's not sure yet what 's caused the water supply for customers in south-east derbyshire and north-west leicestershire to register a higher level of chlorine than usual .
a company spokesman said : `` clearly we do use chlorination as part of the normal everyday activities that we do at our reservoirs to make sure there 's a great quality of water coming out .
`` it looks like there 's been over-chlorination .
once we 've got through this incident and we 've flushed the water through the system then we can go back and take a look and see exactly what happened . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: here 's a summary of the main stories we 're covering this afternoon :
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: water ban to stays until company gives notice
text: a severn trent water spokesman has told bbc radio derby : `` the issue is that we normally add chlorine as part of our normal everyday work at the reservoir to make sure the water is fine for everyone , but we think that there might be a problem with over-chlorination .

`` just to reiterate nobody should use the water at all , so do n't use it to flush the toilet , do n't use it to drink , do n't use it to prepare vegetables , do n't use it to wash , nothing at all until we give the go-ahead to actually start using it again . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: water ban affects 3,700 homes
text: a water ban issued by severn trent water affects 3,700 customers in south-east derbyshire and north-west leicestershire .
the firm 's customers in the area are asked not to use their water for anything because of higher levels of chlorine at a service reservoir .
a spokesman said : `` we have an issue with one of our reservoirs where as a precaution we 're asking people in certain postcodes not to use the water . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: water ban covers drinking , bathing and washing food
text: the warning from severn trent water to its customers in the de11 , de73 and le65 postcode areas not to use their water supply covers drinking , preparing food and bathing .
the firm says : `` we 're sorry for the inconvenience this will cause and we 're working hard to isolate the problem and get everything back to normal as quickly as possible .
`` a do not use notice means that customers should n't use their water supply for anything . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: water warning for south derbyshire residents
text: residents across a large part of south derbyshire and north-west leicestershire are being advised not to use their water supply until further notice .
the warning affects anyone living in the de11 , de73 and le65 postcode areas .
severn trent water issued the instruction as a precaution while it investigates a problem with higher than normal levels of chlorine at one of its service reservoirs in the derbyshire area .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: tests expose hackney carriage problems
text: derby city council says none of the hackney carriages it inspected in late 2015 was in a good condition .
the authority targets its tests towards those which might have problems .
more than half of those checked had serious issues .
author: BBC Radio Derby

documents.title: 40 calls to crimewatch about derby rape case
text: police received about 40 calls following a crimewatch appeal about an unsolved derby rape case .
det ch insp dave cox , from derbyshire police , said there were several lines of inquiry for officers to follow up from the calls to the studio .
he said : i would like to encourage the public to contact us with any information they may have in relation to this terrifying incident .
`` we can quickly eliminate people from our inquiry due to forensic evidence that has been gathered previously . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: magpies say goodbye to mcclaren
text: former derby county boss steve mcclaren has been sacked by newcastle united .

documents.title: bloomfield house : your comments
text: news that bbc radio derby 's building is to be renamed bloomfield house in memory of colin bloomfield has attracted lots of kind comments on facebook .
gill child posted : `` a very fitting tribute to colin , the people of derby still hold him dear and this great gesture will ensure his memory lives on for years to come . ''
della coulton said : `` that 's absolutely fantastic , a fitting tribute to an extremely brave young man who will never be forgotten . ''
and richard cox was in agreement : `` brownie points for radio derby .
bravo .
a gesture that resonates and shows some thought . ''
author: Facebook

documents.title: wassall : 'rams need reality check '
text: after disappointing midweek defeats derby county and burton albion resume their promotion bids this weekend .
rams head coach darran wassall says his club needs a reality check ahead of tomorrow 's trip to championship strugglers rotherham .
wassall has won three and lost three of his six games in charge .
author: Owen Bradley
BBC Radio Derby Sport

BBC Local Live

documents.title: business minister opens new coffee factory
text: the smell of coffee beans is in the air today as we 're talking about nestle 's new tutbury premises at hatton , which has seen a £ 325m investment .
the factory houses all forms of coffee production on one site , and was officially opened yesterday by business secretary sajid javid .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: new nestle factory opens
text: i fancy a cup of coffee right now , if only i could reach out to the so-called `` coffee centre of excellence '' that we have on our doorstep .
that 's right literally on the east staffordshire/ derbyshire border as nestle 's opened its new tutbury factory in hatton , creating 425 jobs in the process .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: ashley 'disgusted ' by 'antagonistic stance '
text: mike ashley accused mps of `` abusing parliamentary procedure '' in an on-going row over whether he should appear before a select committee in westminster .
replying to a house of commons letter , he wrote : `` i was disgusted to learn that you have adopted a stance that is deliberately antagonistic .

`` by refusing to visit sports direct to see things with your own eyes , you are missing out on a genuine opportunity to gain a detailed and balanced understanding of the matters you wish to discuss .
`` i believe you are abusing parliamentary procedure in an attempt to create a media circus in westminster , which is not in the best interests of any of the people who work at sports direct . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: mike ashley bemoans sports direct 'media circus '
text: sports direct boss mike ashley has brushed off a call to give evidence to a commons select committee about the treatment of his workers .
the newcastle united owner was warned he would be in contempt of parliament unless he agreed to a date to appear before mps .
today he hit back , accusing the committee 's chairman of creating a `` media circus '' which was not in the interests of his staff .
he gave no offer of a date but did repeat an invitation for the committee to visit sport direct 's premises in shirebrook .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: chesterfield man due in court on murder charge
text: a man is due to appear at nottingham crown court today charged with murder after a woman was found dead at the scene of a house fire in chesterfield .
gary tyson , 35 , of shirland street in the town , has been charged with murder , arson and attempted wounding .
firefighters found the body of 32-year-old gemma stevens at her home in catherine street in the early hours of 3 march .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: leap year proposal doubled up
text: when paul burnage was asked by his manager to skipper a boat so designer lotti rawle could pop a surprise question to her boyfriend , little did he know he was in for a big surprise himself that day .
author: Derby Telegraph

documents.title: crimewatch rape appeal 'broadens investigation '
text: after reconstructing the build-up to a rape attack in derby on the bbc 's crimewatch programme last night , derbyshire police is hoping it will lead to a prosecution .
insp emlyn richards said : `` what it did is it gave us a more national perspective , where as many of the appeals previously have been relatively localised to the east midlands area .

`` last night we had people ringing in from all across the uk suggesting names of people that fitted the description of the offender on the programme or that they had sus about , so we 're really pleased with the response . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: latest headlines for derbyshire and east staffordshire
text: these are the main stories we 're covering this morning .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: 'strong response ' to crimewatch rape appeal
text: let 's return to a story we featured yesterday about bbc crimewatch running an appeal on an unsolved rape case in darley abbey .
derbyshire police says it 's had a really strong response to the broadcast and it has given their investigation a broader perspective .
despite several previous appeals , nobody has been arrested over an attack on an 18-year-old woman near a nature reserve in september .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: bloomfield house tribute to presenter
text: colin bloomfield 's story touched hundreds of people and it 's testimony to him that the appeal he lent his name to aimed at making derbyshire and east staffordshire sun safe raised more than £ 152,000 .
bbc radio derby 's news editor rachael gilchrist said : `` we had to get the permission of the landlord to make it official and then go through both the council and the royal mail .
`` that 's all been done and it 's all been ticked off and signed , so this building from now on will be bloomfield house . ''
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live

documents.title: radio derby building renamed bloomfield house
text: it 's a fitting tribute .
bbc radio derby 's building is to be named bloomfield house after former presenter colin bloomfield , who died from skin cancer last year aged 33 .
his appeal to make derbyshire more sun safe has raised more than £ 152,000 .
author: Euan Duncan
BBC Local Live
